text: Mancheharula'i tyasadinadekhi savadhana garide'u jabaki uninira sajaya a'ihalcha. Ra, an'yayakariharule bhannechan ki he hamro palanakarta ‘‘hamila'i thorai samayasam'mako chuta de'u hami timro upadesala'i svikara garnechaum ra paigambaraharu (sandesavahakaharu) ko anusarana garnechaum’’. Ke timi yasabhanda pahile pani sapatha khane gareka thi'enau ki timiharuko patana kahile pani hune chaina
